citadel.description: Including a 50% increase to base creature growth, the Citadel adds a keep, and other terrain obstacles, to a town's defenses.
citadel.name: Citadel

cityHall.description: The City Hall allows you to purchase town structures and earns your kingdom 2000 gold per day.
cityHall.name: City Hall

dwellingLvl1.description: The Centaur Stables allow you to recruit Centaurs.
dwellingLvl1.name: Centaur Stables

dwellingLvl2.description: The Dwarf Cottage allows you to recruit Dwarves.
dwellingLvl2.name: Dwarf Cottage

dwellingLvl3.description: The Homestead allows you to recruit Wood Elves.
dwellingLvl3.name: Homestead

dwellingLvl4.description: The Enchanted Spring allows you to recruit Pegasi.
dwellingLvl4.name: Enchanted Spring

dwellingLvl5.description: The Dendroid Arches allow you to recruit Dendroid Guards.
dwellingLvl5.name: Dendroid Arches

dwellingLvl6.description: The Unicorn Glade allows you to recruit Unicorns.
dwellingLvl6.name: Unicorn Glade

dwellingLvl7.description: The Dragon Cliffs allow you to recruit Green Dragons.
dwellingLvl7.name: Dragon Cliffs

dwellingUpLvl1.description: The Centaur Stables allow you to recruit Centaur Captains.
dwellingUpLvl1.name: Upg. Centaur Stables

dwellingUpLvl7.description: The Dragon Cliffs allow you to recruit Gold Dragons.
dwellingUpLvl7.name: Upg. Dragon Cliffs

fort.description: The Fort provides your town with defensive walls.
fort.name: Fort

grail.description: The presence of the Spirit Guardian increases weekly creature generation by 50%, provides your kingdom with an additional 5000 gold each day, and increases the luck of all allied heroes by +2.
grail.name: Spirit Guardian

horde1.description: The Miners' Guild increases Dwarf production by 4 per week.
horde1.name: Miners' Guild

horde1Upgr.description: The Miners' Guild increases Battle Dwarf production by 4 per week.
horde1Upgr.name: Miners' Guild

horde2.description: The Dendroid Saplings increase Dendroid Guard production by 2 per week.
horde2.name: Dendroid Saplings

horde2Upgr.description: The Dendroid Saplings increase Dendroid Soldier production by 2 per week.
horde2Upgr.name: Dendroid Saplings

marketplace.description: With the Marketplace, you can buy and sell resources (exchange rates increase with each Marketplace you own).
marketplace.name: Marketplace

resourceSilo.description: The Resource Silo provides you with an additional +1 crystal each day.
resourceSilo.name: Resource Silo

special1.description: The Mystic Pond produces a small random number of resources each week.
special1.name: Mystic Pond

special2.description: The Fountain of Fortune increases the luck of the garrison hero by +2 when defending against a siege.
special2.name: Fountain of Fortune

special3.description: The Treasury earns you 10% interest on any gold you have at the start of each week.
special3.name: Treasury

tavern.description: The Tavern increases morale for troops defending the city.
